query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'custom_fields' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FfdjCLoumdFxBM.40c1cc0bca66 --database U4oWTJpkwb9eRxq5w7WA9g --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'custom_fields' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE
id	int

name	varchar
type	enum
